summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Sensitive Skin Soothing Face Cleanser is a gentle, non-stripping cleanser that calms and soothes sensitive skin, reducing redness and dryness in just 2 weeks
details: DetailsBenefitsImmediately calms, soothes, softens, and refreshes sensitive skinReduces signs of skin sensitivity (redness, dryness, itching, stinging, and tightening) in 2 weeksUltra-gentle, hypo-allergenic, alcohol-free, 100% fragrance-free, non-strippingSuitable for all skin types, including eczema-prone skinKey IngredientsFermented heartleaf extract: antioxidant that soothes and hydrates, ideal for comforting sensitive skinCeramides: strengthens the skin barrier as it calms and protects against inflammatory triggers and irritationFermented beta-glucan: replenishes skin and locks in moisture as a hydration super-absorberFormulated WithoutAlcohol, animal-derived ingredients, formaldehyde, fragrance, gluten, mineral oil, oxybenzone, parabens, petrolatum, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, synthetic colorsItem 2631730How To UseTo Use: AM and PMMassage over face and neck to gently remove impurities, oil, makeup and SPF, while leaving behind moisture to reduce signs of sensitivity. Rise or wipe off.Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Beta-Glucan, Ceramide NP, Phaeodactylum Tricornutum Extract, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Lactobacillus Ferment, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To Use: AM and PMMassage over face and neck to gently remove impurities, oil, makeup and SPF, while leaving behind moisture to reduce signs of sensitivity. Rise or wipe off.Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: not quite right
reviews.comments: I thought this was going to lather more and it did not at all.  It states that it removed makeup well.  I noted make up still on my face after washing.  I will be returning this product.  I usually bought from the resurgence line, but wanted to try something different.

reviews.headline: Great for a splurge
reviews.comments: This is a great gentle cleanser for anyone with dry/sensitive skin. I found it doesn't leave my skin feeling stirpped, but did not leave my skin feeling "fresh" at the end. For the price point, I found the La Roche Posay Hydrating Gentle Cleanser gives the same effect at a lower cost with more product in the bottle.

reviews.headline: great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: an amazing cleanser for sensitive skin, but kinda pricey

reviews.headline: perfect cleanser
reviews.comments: AMAZING for extremely dry and sensitive skin types. Saved my life i struggled for a long time trying to find a cleanser that worked for me. 100% recommend to those with dry/ sensitive skins + hasnt caused me any breakouts and its been 2 months of use already. so happy tohave found this product

reviews.headline: literally saved my skin bro
reviews.comments: I used to use the Pacifica purple face wash for sensitive skin but was unfortunately discontinued from stores. I spent MONTHS and so much money looking for a new face wash but they all either broke me out or burned my face due to my sensitive skin. Tried high end and drugstjre but nothing seemed to work. Gave this cleanser a shot as a last resort and saw amazing results within the first use. I kid yall not i havent had a single breakout since buying this and its such a good amount of product too. This is coming from someone who has EXTREMELY dry sensitive skin, i 100% recommend.

reviews.headline: Okay product
reviews.comments: It is very hydrating and gentle, unfortunately it caused breakouts on my face after every use

reviews.headline: Okay product
reviews.comments: It is very hydrating and gentle, unfortunately it caused breakouts on my face after every use

reviews.headline: ACTUALLY safe for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I've essentially destroyed my skin with products marketed for sensitive skin, so badly that I've had to start over. I bought this as a last hope and to my surprise I didn't react at all. It's lightweight but also super hydrating, my skin feels soft and clean after. It helped heal my skin barrier. it literally saved my skin. I won't ever purchase any other cleanser.

reviews.headline: A great no foam cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a no-lather/no-foam cleanser. In my opinion these types of cleansers are better on dry skin, so I like using this in the morning as an ultra gentle cleansing step. It doesn't irritate my skin or eyes and leaves my skin feeling really soft and not stripped. A great morning cleanse if you have sensitive skin! This was gifted by murad for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Perfect all around facewash
reviews.comments: I have such sensitive skin that is acne prone as well so I need face wash that is super gentle. The one is perfect. I use it both day and night. It doesn't dry out my skin at all. It leave it smooth and balance. I love it. Gifted by murad

reviews.headline: Perfect cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Murad their Sensitive Skin Soothing Face Cleanser and it has been a lifesaver for my easily irritated skin. Unlike other 'gentle' cleansers that still leave me red and dry, this one feels like a cooling hug for my face. It even removes stubborn makeup without that awful stripped feeling and honestly, it's the only cleanser I trust now!

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I loved this cleanser so much! I felt this formula emulsified well and really cleaned off my makeup as well as refreshing my skin. I liked how it was not heavily scented as well. I definitely recommend. I was gifted by Murad.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have been using this for over a week now and my dry sensitive skin has been loving it! It's fragrance free and is truly gentle on the skin. It doesn't sud which can feel weird for a cleanser, but it does a great job of cleaning the skin. As a dry girly, my skin doesn't feel tight after I use this which is amazing! - gifted by murad

reviews.headline: No more double cleansing for me
reviews.comments: I just started using this Sensitive Skin Soothing Face Cleanser gifted by Murad Skincare. I really enjoy using this product. I love that it is gentle on my skin. I have been double cleansing for a long time and it has really stripped my skin barrier. I love that this cleanser protects your skin barrier and is gentle, hypo-allergenic, alcohol-free, and 100% fragrance-free. It soothes my acne breakouts, and any redness. It leaves my skin feeling cleaner and more hydrated. This is a really great product and no more double cleansing for me!!

reviews.headline: Super Soothing
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin and suffer from dry acne prone skin. This is a really calming cream cleanser that lathers really well. My skin feels clean after and not stripped at all. It's ever hydrating and my skin feels calm after using this as well. I really recommend this for anyone with dry sensitive skin. Gifted by Murad

reviews.headline: Perfect cleanser for people with sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I am a huge fan of Murad's skin care products so I was beyond excited to try this face cleanser. I was gifted by Murad to try their Sensitive Skin Soothing Face Cleanser and it has been such a pleasant experience! I have super sensitive skin so this cleanser is absolutely perfect for me. I loved that there wasn't really any scent to the cleanser. I find that scented products can irritate my skin so I found it super helpful that this cleanser wasn't scented. I also noticed that there weren't any suds when washing my face, and my skin felt more moisturized and nourished after use. I've been using this cleanser in the morning and at night and it has been so helpful in for easing my skin irritation and calming my skin down. Overall, I think this is the PERFECT cleanser for anyone with sensitive skin and I cannot recommend it more!

reviews.headline: Amazing Cleanser
reviews.comments: I received this cleanser gifted by Murad in exchange for my honest opinion. I really love how light this cleanser is. I also love how it does not leave my face feeling greasy but rather very clean and refreshed after using. It has helped tremendously with my skin drying out.

reviews.headline: very gentle
reviews.comments: My skin gets really dry and irritated in the winter so I have to be careful with cleansers and I appreciate how gentle this one is. It still made my skin feel clean but didn't strip it or make it itchy afterwards. Gifted by murad

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser!
reviews.comments:
If you have sensitive skin - you have to try this cleanser! The best, most gentle formula that actually works and does exactly what it promises to do. It removes makeup, sunscreen without stripping the skin and making it dry. I've been using the product for 2 weeks and I'm so happy I got to try it. 10/10

This product was gifted to me by Murad.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I love that this cleanser is gentle. I also like that it soothes and calms my skin. I have dry skin and it keeps my skin hydrated. I notice less redness with my skin too. This was complimentary from Murad.

faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect cleanser for people with sensitive skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: So I've actually used this before and I would give it a 5/10. Keep in mind every skin is different! My experience was just it dried my face everytime after use. I'm a fan of good scents so this was just not the best. Overall do what you will with that info. Gifted by murad
faceoff_negative.headline: Tried before eh
